Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz suffered an ankle injury during the seventh inning, leading to his replacement in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Derek Shelton mentioned the injury was precautionary due to ankle stiffness and made the decision to replace Cruz.
Others: Oneil Cruz has struggled defensively in center field, with metrics indicating -4 Defensive Runs Saved and -1.4 Ultimate Zong Rating. He has a.268/.326/.459 batting line this season with 19 home runs, 74 RBIs, and 22 stolen bases.
